experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead developer for flagship mobile application with over 1M downloads. Implemented MVVM architecture, Kotlin Coroutines, and Jetpack Compose. Reduced app crash rate by 75% through improved error handling and testing.
achievements: Developed core features for video and image processing in collaboration with team members and optimized them for lower-end devices.
Conducted requirement analysis and led a small team in developing new features.
Collaborated with the QA team to resolve issues, achieving a 99.3% crash-free rate as reported by Firebase Analytics.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed and maintained multiple Android applications for clients across various industries. Implemented RESTful API integration, local database caching, and push notifications.
achievements: Co-developed and architected an EdTech app, resulting in over 100k+ downloads on the Play Store.
Contributed to the development of multiple native Android apps, focusing on C++ and NDK based components.

experience.title: Android Application Developer
experience.description: Worked on both Android and iOS applications. Collaborated with designers and product managers to implement user interfaces and features.
achievements: Designed and developed native Android applications from scratch using Java.
Contributed to an app that achieved 1.8 million downloads within a short timeframe.

experience.title: Junior Software Engineer
experience.description: Working on developing and maintaining web applications using modern technologies.
achievements: Started professional career as an Android developer.
Developed instant messaging and calling apps using the Smack library and PortSIP SDK.

education.description: Specialized in Mobile Computing and Software Engineering. Thesis focused on optimizing mobile app performance through efficient resource management.
